name: The Artifact of Might
description:
Artifact of might is a simple turn based dungeon crawling puzzle game. Where you (the mighty knight) should retrive the the stolen artifact of might. The artifact of might was stolen by the goblin overlord karas. Without this artifact your army is weak and the kingdom will fall apart. The king sends you in karas's dungeon to retrive the artifact before karas extracts its power.

•Arrow keys : movement

•Space bar : action

•X : restart level

ATTENTION:the HTML5 version is a demo of the full game. To experience the whole game. Download the full version. Currently available for WINDOWS
